Key Match Events: The Milwaukee Brewers clinched the NL Central Division championship with a 2-1 walkoff win over the Philadelphia Phillies on September 18, 2024
Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers clinched the NL Central before their game against the Phillies, making it a little easier for the team to wait before popping the champagne
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers broadcaster Bob Uecker was honored as 'epitomiz[ing] a champion' and showered with champagne, responding with 'I peed my pants!'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers will be in the playoffs for the third time in four years, giving Uecker a chance to call a World Series game for the sixth time in the last seven years
